original_text: And the Philistines fought, and Israel was smitten, and they fled every man into his tent: and there was a very great slaughter; for there fell of Israel thirty thousand footmen.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들이 쳤더니 이스라엘이 패하여 각기 장막으로 도망하였고 살륙이 심히 커서 이스라엘 보병의 엎드러진 자가 삼만 명이었으며

sentences.original_text: and they fled every man into his tent
and there was a very great slaughter
for there fell of Israel thirty thousand footmen
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 이스라엘 보병 삼만 명이 쓰러졌기 때문이었다
